ok, hers an updated how to use the TrialtoRetail.reg

-----------------------------------------------
Installation with the Registry entry: |||||
-----------------------------------------------
start the .exe
accept the license agreement
choose typical install
DO NOT add a username or password and make sure the "set update parameters later" box is ticked
enable the "threatsense warning system"
enable "detection of unwanted applications"
click install
click "strict potection"
press ctrl+alt+del and bring up the task manager.
in the processes tab end process "egui.exe"
click on the "TrialtoRetail.reg"
Restart your computer

ok, hers an updated how to use the TrialtoRetail.reg

-----------------------------------------------
Installation with the Registry entry: |||||
-----------------------------------------------
start the .exe
accept the license agreement
choose typical install
DO NOT add a username or password and make sure the "set update parameters later" box is ticked
enable the "threatsense warning system"
enable "detection of unwanted applications"
click install
click "strict potection"
press ctrl+alt+del and bring up the task manager.
in the processes tab end process "egui.exe"
click on the "TrialtoRetail.reg"
Restart your computer
